title: Brighten Gifts Motivational Coloring Posters - 16 Different, Heavyweight, Inspirational, Quotes to Color (With Drawing Board) for Business Owners, Teachers, Coaches, & Students, 9.5x12.5
features: Empowering Design - 16 different, 9 x 12, bold, wall art posters for positive thinking, achievement, and a growth mindset.
High Quality - Our posters are made from the highest quality, heavyweight, 100lb, acid free card stock perfect for use with colored pencils and markers.

Inspirational Activity - Think positive while you color and affirm a positive mindset great for business owners, students, coaches, teachers, and for anyone who wants to reinforce self-confidence and achieving goals.

Made in the USA - We are a small family owned business and utilize local manufactures for all of our coloring sets. Each poster set comes conveniently packaged flat in a plastic zip case with a drawing board for sturdy packaging and ease of coloring.
Satisfaction Guaranteed - We care deeply about our customers and for any reason if you are not completely satisfied, simply return the product for a full refund.
